name.description: Name of the devcontainer in cluster. This parameter intended for a clearer, more human-friendly name. If not set, defaults to the devcontainer id.

description.description: Description of the devcontainer in cluster. This parameter intended for a more detailed description of the devcontainer.

repository_url.description: URL to the repository. Cannot coexist with repository_path.

repository_path.description: Local path to the repository. Cannot coexist with repository_url.

branch.description: Branch name (default 'main'). Optional, ignored if repository_path is set.
